Read a text file (containing CSV data). Arguments: istream, vector<vector<string>>

Parameters:
input (istream) The input stream (file) that we are reading from. Must be already open.
output (vector<vector<string>>) A 2D vector of strings to be populated with csv data.
Accepts an open input file stream
